title: Make a New Primitive Type
description: Create a basic MutInt class, improve its string representation, add mathematical and comparison operations, and implement type conversions to make a new primitive type in Python.

meta.title: Make a New Primitive Type
meta.description: Create a basic MutInt class, improve its string representation, add mathematical and comparison operations, and implement type conversions to make a new primitive type in Python.
meta.keywords: Python, new primitive type, MutInt class, mathematical operations, type conversions

verify.name: Verify MutInt Class Creation
verify.hint: Make sure you've created the MutInt class with __init__ method in mutint.py

verify.name: Verify String Representation Methods
verify.hint: Ensure you've added the __str__, __repr__, and __format__ methods to the MutInt class

verify.name: Verify Math Operation Methods
verify.hint: Make sure you've added the __add__, __radd__, and __iadd__ methods to the MutInt class

verify.name: Verify Comparison Methods
verify.hint: Make sure you've added the comparison methods and the @total_ordering decorator

verify.name: Verify Type Conversion Methods
verify.hint: Make sure you've added the __int__, __float__, and __index__ methods
